entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: WSW 30 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
